messages.content:
make this more pro: Bonjour Nick, Hanaa and Sandrine
Good to know about the sequencing being flexible. Is there anything else you need from me or if we are still waiting on HR? If possible to do without adding any additional causes for delay, I'd like to request a 22 week (5.5 months) contract to ensure completion within the timeframe, while in all likelihood ending around 4 months.
Let me know if there's anyÂ

Certainly! Here's a more professional version of your message:

---

Subject: Follow-Up on Contract Sequencing

Bonjour Nick, Hanaa, and Sandrine,

I appreciate the update regarding the flexibility of the sequencing. Could you please confirm if there are any additional requirements from my end, or if we are still awaiting further information from HR?

If feasible and without introducing any additional delays, I would like to request a 22-week (5.5 months) contract. This timeframe aims to ensure project completion within the designated period, with the expectation that the actual duration will likely be around 4 months.

Please let me know if there are any further details needed or any updates.

Thank you,
[Your Name]
